review: Very easy to setup and it works great to date  (only used 2 days).This is a better option to buying a "Smart" TV.  The problem with "Smart" TVs is they do not work as good as this product and "Smart TVs" get dumber every day.  By that I mean the "Smart" part of the TV cannot be upgraded very easily which means as time passes and technology gets better the "Smart" part of today's TVs get dumber.I say one should just buy a good "dumb" TV and Fire Stick (or similar).  When technology changes just change the Fire Stick.

review: I have the Fire TV, so when this went on sale for Prime Day, I grabbed it.  Its such a great device.  I was pretty committed in my house to AppleTV, but now I wish i had gone with the Fire TV in all rooms. With my AppleTV's (we have three of them) we often get poor performance of streaming shows.  I have never had a problem with the Fire TV.This Stick made a nice addition to the system.  Very happy with this.
